name: contingency_loan_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will the Loan Contingency be removed?
label: Loan Contingency Days
description: This applies because you chose not to waive this contingency.
tips: The loan contingency removal timeline should align with your lender's expected processing time.
small_print: The typical timeline for removal of the loan contingency is 17 days. Missing the contingency removal deadline may affect your contract rights.

contingency_loan_days.name: contingency_loan_days

suggested.hint: Anything over 25 days may affect your offer's competitiveness.
